AI Description: GL2PS is an OpenGL to PostScript printing library that converts any OpenGL action into a vector PostScript image. It provides capabilities for saving OpenGL-generated 2D and 3D graphics as encapsulated PostScript files. GL2PS is written in C++ and can be easily integrated into existing OpenGL code.
Core Features:
1. Conversion of OpenGL graphics to PostScript format
2. Support for 2D and 3D graphics
3. Integration with existing OpenGL applications
4. Vector-based output for high-quality printing
5. Cross-platform compatibility
General Tags: Opengl, Postscript, Printing, Graphics, Vector Graphics
